trans-unit.source: Our web server is in the midst of maintenance. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused.
trans-unit.target: 我们的网络服务器在维护中。 我们很抱歉导致了您的不便。

trans-unit.source: Our web server is in the midst of maintenance until 14 December, 2011. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused.
trans-unit.target: 我们的网络服务器在维护中，14号12月回复正常。 我们很抱歉导致了您的不便。

trans-unit.source: Do you want to proceed to member placement?
trans-unit.target: 您要继续组织系谱图吗?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure want to place this member into this position?
trans-unit.target: 您确定此会员放置在此位置吗?

trans-unit.source: Trading spot forex, CFDs, options, and spread bets is risky and not suitable for everyone. All of these products (excluding Binary CFDs and Binary Spread Bets) are leveraged, and you can lose more than your initial deposit. Don’t trade more than you can afford to lose.
trans-unit.target: 交易即期外汇，差价合约，期权和传播的赌注是有风险的，而不是每个人都适合。所有这些产品（不包括二进制差价合约（CFD）和二进制传播投注）具有杠杆作用，你可以失去超过您最初的保证金。不要交易超过你能承受的损失。

trans-unit.source: Past performance is not indicative of future results, as returns may vary according to market conditions. Trading in foreign exchange is speculative and may involve the loss of principal; therefore, funds placed under management should be risk capital funds that if lost will not significantly affect one's personal financial well being. No representation is being made that participating in a managed forex account or managed forex trading program will necessarily lead to profit. Investors may incur into a series of consecutive losses and substantial equity-draw-downs that can deplete their funds before the occurrence of any meaningful profit accumulation.
trans-unit.target: 过往表现并不预示未来的结果，作为回报可能会根据市场情况而有所不同。外汇交易是投机性的，并可能涉及的本金损失，因此，基金管理下的风险资本基金，其损失将不会显着影响一个人的个人财务状况。没有表示一个外汇帐户管理或参与管理的外汇交易计划必然导致利润。投资者可能产生到一系列连续亏损和庞大的资本绘制起伏，可以耗尽他们的资金发生前的任何有意义的利润积累。

trans-unit.source: Consortium is the latest project undertaken by Maxim Trader to develop a cooperative for financial leverage with a pioneering inclusion of third party individuals.
trans-unit.target: 联盟是最新的项目发展合作具有开拓包括第三方的个人财务杠杆由马胜金融集团的交易进行。

trans-unit.source: Our business model is simple and straight forward : to maximize leverage through a system of pooled resources coupled with trading technology and expertise. Our objective is clear : to profit in an exponential manner to benefit both company and clients.
trans-unit.target: 我们的商业模式是简单而直接的：通过系统汇集资源，再加上交易技术和专业知识，最大程度地发挥。我们的目标很明确：以指数方式获利，以造福两国公司和客户。

trans-unit.source: One of the most powerful tools successful people use on a regular basis is leverage. Leverage means utilizing the strengths of other people, processes and things, to do a lot more than what you would have otherwise done alone.
trans-unit.target: 成功的人定期使用的最有力的工具之一是杠杆。杠杆是指利用的其他人员，流程和活动的优势，做更多的事情比什么，否则你会独自完成。

trans-unit.source: The famous Greek mathematician, Archimedes, said
trans-unit.target: 著名的希腊数学家阿基米德说，

trans-unit.source: Give me a lever long enough and a place to stand, and I can move the world.
trans-unit.target: 给我一个足够长的杠杆和一个支点，我可以移动的世界。

trans-unit.source: The financial market is an immensely rich environment for those well endorsed enough to take advantage of. While Professional traders and Portfolio managers do make an obscene amount of money, other traders just experience the tip of the iceberg of wealth.
trans-unit.target: 金融市场是一个非常丰富的环境，以及批准足够的利用。专业交易员和投资组合经理做大笔的钱，其他交易者可以体验到财富的冰山的尖端。

trans-unit.source: For most traders, making money consistently is a difficult task. There are times where your judgment will be wrong or your timing will be off, resulting in loss of money. This is why the average individual is not actively trading, causing many opportunities to slip by and profit potential lost.
trans-unit.target: 对于大多数交易者，赚钱始终是一项艰巨的任务。有很多次，你的判断是错误的或你的时间将被关闭，造成损失的钱。这是为什么个人平均不积极交易，导致很多机会溜走的潜在利润损失。

trans-unit.source: Being consistently successful at trading takes knowledge, expertise and capital. The winner-takes-all nature of trading the markets explains the income disparity within the industry.
trans-unit.target: 一贯成功的交易需要知识，技能和资本。 “赢家通吃所有市场交易性质的解释行业内的收入差距。

trans-unit.source: The difference between simply trying to be rich and becoming fabulously rich traders lies in expertise, technology and systems.
trans-unit.target: 无非是想成为富豪，成为非常富有的商人之间的区别在于专业知识，技术和系统。

trans-unit.source: Extraordinary profits are made by spotting an
trans-unit.target: 非经常性损益是由点状出血的

trans-unit.source: But this is easier said than done and not everyone can get rich using this method. There is only so much money to be made in any one arbitrage opportunity. The first person who acts usually gets the biggest piece of the pie.
trans-unit.target: 但是，这是说起来容易做起来难，并不是每个人都使用这种方法，可以得到丰富。只有这么多钱，可以在任何一个套利机会。第一人的行为通常得到了最大的一块蛋糕。

trans-unit.source: There's another reason why superior expertise is key: the "moving first" advantage.
trans-unit.target: 还有另外一个原因，卓越的专业知识是关键：“移动第一”的优势。

trans-unit.source: Let's say for example some news hits the market and that traders interpret this news at different speeds.
trans-unit.target: 比方说，例如一些消息冲击市场，贸易商解释这条消息以不同的速度。

trans-unit.source: One trader figures out what the news means in a second, while the other traders require five seconds. Still, there are some other traders that require an entire day or maybe even up to a month to figure things out.
trans-unit.target: 一位交易商计算出什么消息指在第二，而其他的交易者需要五秒钟。不过，也有一些其他的交易者，需要一整天的时间，甚至长达一个月的去理出头绪来。

trans-unit.source: The early traders earn the extra money. They get into action early, at optimal prices, and reap most of the gains while the other, later, slower traders pile on.
trans-unit.target: 早期的商人赚取额外的钱。他们进入行动早，最优的价格，以及获得的大部分涨幅，而其他的，以后，速度较慢的商人桩上。

trans-unit.source: Individual investors lack the skills, expertise and technology to consistently profit from his trading. Needless to say, a more effective way is to pool resources to consistently come out ahead in this ruthless pursuit for trading gains.
trans-unit.target: 个人投资者缺乏技能，专业知识和技术，不断从他的交易中获利。不用说，更有效的方式是集中资源，始终出人头地，无情地追求交易收益。

trans-unit.source: This is why the considerable resources of Maxim Trader is combined with those of its clients/shareholders; enlarging the capital base of both to profit from the immerse opportunities the financial markets of the day has to offer – the currency market.
trans-unit.target: 这就是为什么相当多的资源马胜金融相结合，与它的客户/股东，扩大资本基础都浸泡的一天的金融市场所提供的机遇 - 货币市场中获利。

trans-unit.source: With the vast selection of platforms out there, the question here is 'why choose Maxim Trader?' An intelligent client always seeks to get his money's worth and such is the inspiration behind the 'Consortium Model'.
trans-unit.target: 有广阔的选择平台，这里的问题是“为什么选择马胜金融吗？”智能客户端总是设法得到他的钱的价值和这样的“联盟模式”背后的灵感。

trans-unit.source: In line with resource pooling, Maxim Trader will match clients' capital up to a maximum bonus of a dollar to dollar capital enhancement. This also means that you could have up to twice your original capital working for you. The reason for this is simple. With the Maximtrade™ Executor, more profits are generated not only for you, but for the company as well. Moreover, we take the risk with you so you can have peace of mind that we will do our utmost to ensure positive results.
trans-unit.target: 在资源池，马胜金融将符合客户的资本美元美元的资金提高到最高奖金。这也意味着，你最多可以有两次为你工作，你的原始资本。这样做的原因是简单的。随着Maximtrade™遗嘱执行人，不仅对你产生更多的利润，但公司以及。此外，我们采取的风险与你，让你可以安心，我们会尽最大的努力，确保积极的结果。

trans-unit.source: All clients fund are individually and severally insured in the form of a parental guarantee provided by our parent company MY Group Inc. Specifically, every dollar invested by our client is backed by a corresponding share of the parent company. With this unique arrangement, investors have the comfort and knowledge that in the unlikely event of insolvency of Maxim Trader, they have in their hands the shares of a public listed company in which they can use to mitigate such risks.
trans-unit.target: 所有的客户基金的个别和连带被保险人的父母由我们的母公司MY集团有限公司提供担保的具体形式，我们的客户每投入一美元的相应份额的母公司的支持。这种独特的安排，投资者有舒适和知识，在不太可能发生的破产马胜金融，他们必须在他们手中的股份的上市公司中，他们可以用它来减轻这种风险。

trans-unit.source: With the two key elements in place, leverage through resource pooling and an automated trading machine, Maxim Trader is able to achieve even greater revenue that what is has been generating stably over the decade. As our system produced profits for you, it is simultaneously producing profits off you because Maxim Trader achieves revenue through the number of lots traded. This creates a win-win situation through a fair system that yields profits for both parties.
trans-unit.target: 随着地方的两个关键要素，充分利用通过资源池和自动贩卖机中，马克西姆交易，已产生稳定在过去的十年，能够实现更大的收入。由于我们的系统为你产生利润，同时产生掉你的利润，因为马克西姆交易实现收入通过交易手数。这将创建一个双赢的局面，产生的利润双方通过公平的制度。

trans-unit.source: Maxim Trader gives credit where credit is due, often in the form of monetary rewards and incentives for our affiliates. The increase in revenue allows liquidity to be channeled towards marketing campaigns that will evidently generate more leads and business back to Maxim Trader. Our clients are happy, our affiliates are rewarded and company expands.
trans-unit.target: 马胜金融交易者提供信贷信用，往往是由于货币奖励和激励措施，为我们的附属机构的形式。收入的增加使流动性渠道对营销活动，显然会产生更多的供应商和商业马胜金融。我们的客户很高兴，我们的分支机构给予奖励和公司扩大。

trans-unit.source: As do all financial giants, the eventual goal is towards listing. With the capital raised, the positive growth on financial statements, the profitable trade history on our technology and the mustered support of all partners through the Consortium project, listing will be a reality. By the provision of value to our clients, we are in turn rewarded with profits which are further ploughed back into the business and eventually allows all stakeholders, partners and clients to prosper.
trans-unit.target: 像所有的金融巨头，最终目标是向上市。募集资金，对财务报表的正增长，我们的技术和有利可图的贸易历史，纠集支持所有的合作伙伴通过联盟项目，上市将成为现实。通过为我们的客户提供的价值，我们是反过来的利润被进一步拨回的业务，并最终使所有利益相关者，客户和合作伙伴繁荣的回报。

trans-unit.source: is a subject that intrigues most people and pervades their thoughts because whether we like it or not, money drives our lives and is a medium of exchange for basic needs to luxurious wants. Having interest in wealth is doing yourself a great service and finding Maxim Trader could possibly be the start of your financial career and freedom. The word create is defined as bringing something into existence. Wealth should be created and not competed for what already exists. Take a look around and you will notice the most successful business are build by creating value that is hard to compete with and was non existent in predecessors.
trans-unit.target: 是一门所关心的大多数人并贯穿他们的想法，因为不管我们喜欢还是不喜欢，金钱推动着我们的生活，是一个中等交换的基本需求，以豪华的欲望。有兴趣的财富做自己出色的服务和寻找，马胜金融可能是您的金融职业生涯的开始和自由。 Word创建的定义是把存在的东西。的财富应建立和没有竞争已经存在。环顾四周，你会发现最成功的业务是建立在前人创造价值，是难分高下，是不存在的。

trans-unit.source: As a catalyst of chance, Maxim Trader has always adopted a forward looking attitude towards inducing change and creating more value for our clients, who form an integral part of our business model. With the Consortium project, clients are able to develop multiple income streams that stem from an all rounded trading experience.
trans-unit.target: 作为催化剂的机会，马克西姆交易一直采取向前看的态度，向诱导变化和创造更多的价值为我们的客户，我们的业务模式的一个组成部分。与该财团项目，客户能够开发出多种收入流干的多元化贸易经验。

trans-unit.source: In this time of extreme volatility and global economic dislocations as seen by the mind-boggling public debts in both the Eurozone and U.S., the time to made superlative profits is now. After all, Baron Rothschild, an 18th century British nobleman and member of the Rothschild banking family, is credited with saying that
trans-unit.target: 在极度波动及全球经济混乱所看到的令人难以置信的公共债务在欧元区和美国，时间作出最高级的利润是现在这个时候。毕竟，18世纪的英国贵族和罗斯柴尔德银行家族的成员，罗斯柴尔德男爵，计入说，

trans-unit.source: The time to buy is when there's blood in the streets.
trans-unit.target: 最好买进的时间就是满街都是血的时候。

trans-unit.source: Your potential income at Maxim Trader is broadly defined in 3 main categories : Trade income, Entry package entitlements and Affiliate bonuses. This is a non exhaustive representation due to seasonal promotions and rewards through performance indicators.
trans-unit.target: 你的潜在收入在Maxim交易的定义很广，在3个主要类别：贸易收入，进入包的权利和联盟的奖金。这是一个非详尽表示，由于季节性促销和奖励，通过绩效指标。

trans-unit.source: With Maxim Trader, your basic income is derived from the profits generated by the trades that our fund management or algorithmic software executes. In addition, you have the full freedom to apply your own trading techniques and generate profits from trading as well.
trans-unit.target: 马胜金融产生的利润的行业，我们的基金管理或执行算法的软件，你的基本收入来源。此外，你有充分的自由申请自己的交易技巧，以及从交易产生的利润。

trans-unit.source: Maxim Trader Financial offers you at attractive array of entry packages to benefit from our proprietary trading system. The entitlements derived purely from becoming a member have a value that far outweighs the costs. This income is your entitlement as a member.
trans-unit.target: 马胜金融金融为您提供有吸引力的阵列的入门套件受益于我们的专有交易系统。纯粹成为会员的权益有一个值，该值远远大于成本。这部分收入是你的权利的一员。

trans-unit.source: Maximtrade™ Executor is our proprietary algorithmic trade technology, which is the outcome of Maxim Trader's research efforts over the last couple of years. Although the major experimenting, modification and enhancement has concluded, Maxim Trader is constantly monitoring performance for optimum trade productivity. We are proud to say that we will be offering Maximtrade™ Executor to our clients. A manumatic operating system that inputs Maxim Trader's trading expertise into your system while allowing you enough flexibility to make your own trading decisions.
trans-unit.target: Maximtrade™ Executor是我们的一种特有算法交易技术，这是的结果，Maxim的交易的研究工作在过去的几年里。虽然主要的试验，修改和提高的结论，马克西姆交易不断监控为最佳贸易生产率的性能。我们很自豪地说，我们将会为我们的客户提供Maximtrade™执行人。一个manumatic操作系统，输入Maxim的交易“交易进入你的系统的专业知识，同时让你有足够的灵活性，以使自己的交易决策。

trans-unit.source: Business synergy is a prerequisite to success and we recognise and reward all our affiliates and partners. Our business can be your business as we provide a platform for income generation.
trans-unit.target: 业务协同效应是成功的先决条件，我们认识到，我们所有的分支机构和合作伙伴进行奖励。我们的业务可以是你的业务，为我们提供了一个平台，为创收。
